titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 2056 entitled "A bill for the relief of Sascha Glade Weinzheimer, Jean Weinzheimer Jansen, Doris Alexa Weinzheimer, Walter Richard Weinzheimer, and the estate of Walter Weinzheimer" to the Chief Judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 2/16/1988--Introduced. Refers S. 2056, a bill for the relief of named individuals and a named estate, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.
